Uses of Package
com.interface21.jndi

Packages that use com.interface21.jndi
com.interface21.ejb.access This package contains classes that allow easy access to EJBs.  
com.interface21.jndi The classes in this package make JNDI easier to use, facilitating the accessing of configuration stored in JNDI, and provide useful superclasses for JNDI access classes.  
com.interface21.jndi.support The simplest implementation of the JNDI SPI that could possibly work.  
com.interface21.transaction.jta Transaction SPI implementation for JTA. 
 

Classes in com.interface21.jndi used by com.interface21.ejb.access
AbstractJndiLocator
          Convenient superclass for JNDI-based Service Locators.
 

Classes in com.interface21.jndi used by com.interface21.jndi
AbstractJndiLocator
          Convenient superclass for JNDI-based Service Locators.
ContextCallback
          Callback interface to be implemented by classes that need to perform an operation (such as a lookup) in a JNDI context.
JndiTemplate
          Helper class that simplifies JNDI operations.
 

Classes in com.interface21.jndi used by com.interface21.jndi.support
JndiTemplate
          Helper class that simplifies JNDI operations.
 

Classes in com.interface21.jndi used by com.interface21.transaction.jta
JndiTemplate
          Helper class that simplifies JNDI operations.
